title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB: The checkboxes in the Export Zip feature do not use a busy cursor during the updating process.
EB: The Export Zip feature should use a busy cursor while updating the checkboxes.
SR:
To replicate the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects. 
2. Choose the 'Export Zip' option. 
3. Select all projects. 
4. Choose some file types. 
5. Click 'OK' to start the export process.
